title: Konstantin Kolesnikov
position: Engineering Manager, Team Lead at Mail.Ru Group

description.part1: Passionate about programming, DevOps and IT in general. I am constantly developing myself and others. Speak publicly. Writing articles on mood. Read little fiction but a lot of technical literature. Once I decided that I needed a personal page and tried Gatsby at the same time.
description.part2: If there is something to say, I am always glad to communicate!
